verses.verse: And Abraham <WH85> journeyed <WH5265> from thence <WH4480> <WH8033> toward the south <WH5045> country, <WH776> and dwelled <WH3427> between <WH996> Kadesh <WH6946> and Shur, <WH7793> and sojourned <WH1481> in Gerar. <WH1642>

And Abraham <WH85> said <WH559> of <WH413> Sarah <WH8283> his wife, <WH802> She <WH1931> is my sister: <WH269> and Abimelech <WH40> king <WH4428> of Gerar <WH1642> sent, <WH7971> and took <WH3947> <WH853> Sarah. <WH8283>

But God <WH430> came <WH935> to <WH413> Abimelech <WH40> in a dream <WH2472> by night, <WH3915> and said <WH559> to him, Behold, <WH2009> thou art but a dead man, <WH4191> for <WH5921> the woman <WH802> which <WH834> thou hast taken; <WH3947> for she <WH1931> is a man's <WH1167> wife. <WH1166>
But Abimelech <WH40> had not <WH3808> come near <WH7126> <WH413> her: and he said, <WH559> Lord, <WH136> wilt thou slay <WH2026> also <WH1571> a righteous <WH6662> nation? <WH1471>

Said <WH559> he <WH1931> not <WH3808> unto me, She <WH1931> is my sister? <WH269> and she, <WH1931> even <WH1571> she herself <WH1931> said, <WH559> He <WH1931> is my brother: <WH251> in the integrity <WH8537> of my heart <WH3824> and innocency <WH5356> of my hands <WH3709> have I done <WH6213> this. <WH2063>

And God <WH430> said <WH559> unto <WH413> him in a dream, <WH2472> Yea, <WH1571> I <WH595> know <WH3045> that <WH3588> thou didst <WH6213> this <WH2063> in the integrity <WH8537> of thy heart; <WH3824> for I <WH595> also <WH1571> withheld <WH2820> thee from sinning <WH4480> <WH2398> against me: therefore <WH5921> <WH3651> suffered <WH5414> I thee not <WH3808> to touch <WH5060> <WH413> her.

Now <WH6258> therefore restore <WH7725> the man <WH376> his wife; <WH802> for <WH3588> he <WH1931> is a prophet, <WH5030> and he shall pray <WH6419> for <WH1157> thee, and thou shalt live: <WH2421> and if <WH518> thou restore <WH7725> her not, <WH369> know <WH3045> thou that <WH3588> thou shalt surely die, <WH4191> <WH4191> thou, <WH859> and all <WH3605> that <WH834> are thine.

Therefore Abimelech <WH40> rose early <WH7925> in the morning, <WH1242> and called <WH7121> all <WH3605> his servants, <WH5650> and told <WH1696> <WH853> all <WH3605> these <WH428> things <WH1697> in their ears: <WH241> and the men <WH376> were sore afraid. <WH3372> <WH3966>

Then Abimelech <WH40> called <WH7121> Abraham, <WH85> and said <WH559> unto him, What <WH4100> hast thou done <WH6213> unto us? and what <WH4100> have I offended <WH2398> thee, that <WH3588> thou hast brought <WH935> on <WH5921> me and on <WH5921> my kingdom <WH4467> a great <WH1419> sin? <WH2401> thou hast done <WH6213> deeds <WH4639> unto <WH5973> me that <WH834> ought not <WH3808> to be done. <WH6213>
And Abimelech <WH40> said <WH559> unto <WH413> Abraham, <WH85> What <WH4100> sawest <WH7200> thou, that <WH3588> thou hast done <WH6213> <WH853> this <WH2088> thing? <WH1697>

And Abraham <WH85> said, <WH559> Because <WH3588> I thought, <WH559> Surely <WH7535> the fear <WH3374> of God <WH430> is not <WH369> in this <WH2088> place; <WH4725> and they will slay <WH2026> me for <WH5921> my wife's <WH802> sake. <WH1697>

And yet <WH1571> indeed <WH546> she is my sister; <WH269> she <WH1931> is the daughter <WH1323> of my father, <WH1> but <WH389> not <WH3808> the daughter <WH1323> of my mother; <WH517> and she became <WH1961> my wife. <WH802>

And it came to pass, <WH1961> when <WH834> God <WH430> caused me to wander <WH8582> from my father's house, <WH4480> <WH1004> <WH1> that I said <WH559> unto her, This <WH2088> is thy kindness <WH2617> which <WH834> thou shalt show <WH6213> unto <WH5973> me; at <WH413> every <WH3605> place <WH4725> whither <WH834> <WH8033> we shall come, <WH935> say <WH559> of me, He <WH1931> is my brother. <WH251>

And Abimelech <WH40> took <WH3947> sheep, <WH6629> and oxen, <WH1241> and menservants, <WH5650> and womenservants, <WH8198> and gave <WH5414> them unto Abraham, <WH85> and restored <WH7725> him <WH853> Sarah <WH8283> his wife. <WH802>
And Abimelech <WH40> said, <WH559> Behold, <WH2009> my land <WH776> is before <WH6440> thee: dwell <WH3427> where it pleaseth <WH2896> <WH5869> thee.

And unto Sarah <WH8283> he said, <WH559> Behold, <WH2009> I have given <WH5414> thy brother <WH251> a thousand <WH505> pieces of silver: <WH3701> behold, <WH2009> he <WH1931> is to thee a covering <WH3682> of the eyes, <WH5869> unto all <WH3605> that <WH834> are with <WH854> thee, and with <WH854> all <WH3605> other: thus she was reproved. <WH3198>

So Abraham <WH85> prayed <WH6419> unto <WH413> God: <WH430> and God <WH430> healed <WH7495> <WH853> Abimelech, <WH40> and his wife, <WH802> and his maidservants; <WH519> and they bore <WH3205> children.

For <WH3588> the LORD <WH3068> had fast closed up <WH6113> <WH6113> <WH1157> all <WH3605> the wombs <WH7358> of the house <WH1004> of Abimelech, <WH40> because <WH5921> <WH1697> of Sarah <WH8283> Abraham's <WH85> wife. <WH802>
